name: Biohazard Chronicles HD Selection
summary:
Biohazard Chronicles HD Selection is an on-rails light gun shooter that includes the two RE: Chronicles games.
Revisiting past plots from the series and exposing Umbrella Corporation's actions, The Umbrella Chronicles features eight playable characters, including Rebecca Chambers, Chris Redfield and Jill Valentine.
The Darkside Chronicles plot takes players back to the story of Leon Kennedy and Claire Redfield trying to escape the nightmares of Raccoon City, while finally revealing the truth behind Leon and Krauser's feud.
